Key Match Events: Tyrone Taylor made a sliding grab in center field to narrowly avoid a collision with right fielder Starling Marte, preventing a two-run extra-base hit.
Post-Match Reflections: Mets manager Carlos Mendoza said, 'When you're giving a team like this extra outs, extra bases, they're going to make you pay.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets committed four errors in three NLCS games.
The Mets have made 10 errors in their last 29 games, tied for third fewest in that stretch.
